title: Don't Dream It's Over
lyrics:
There is freedom within, there is freedom without
Try to catch the deluge in a paper cup
There's a battle ahead, many battles are lost
But you’ll never see the end of the road while you're travelin' with me
Hey now, hey now

Don’t dream it's over

Hey now, hey now

When the world comes in

They come, they come

To build a wall between us

Ooh

We know they won't win



Now I'm towin' my car, there's a hole in the roof

My possessions are causin' me suspicion but there's no proof

In the paper today, tales of war and of waste

But you turn right over to the TV page



Hey now, hey now

Don’t dream it’s over

Hey now, hey now

When the world comes in

They come, they come

To build a wall between us

Ooh

We know they won't win



Mhm, yeah

Oo-ooh

Oo-oo-oo-ooh

Oo-ooh

Mm

Oo-ooh

Oo-ooh

Oo-oo-ooh



Now I’m walkin' again to the beat of a drum

And I'm countin' the steps to the door of Your heart

Ooh

Only shadows ahead, barely clearin’ the roof

Ooh

Get to know the feelin' of liberation and release



Hey now, hey now

Don't dream it's over

When the world comes in

They come, they come

To build a wall between us
